Thank you for registering on TesteBac. Your registration is pending approval by a moderator. This process may take up to 24 hours. 

If you have any questions, please contact us at {email}.
Old.subject: Sign in to TesteBac

ALREADY_ANSWERED.message: You've already submitted an answer for this question. You cannot change your answer once submitted.
ALREADY_ANSWERED.title: Already Answered

ALREADY_ENDED.message: This test has already been completed. You cannot make changes to a finished test.
ALREADY_ENDED.title: Test Already Completed

ALREADY_STARTED.message: This test has already been started. You can continue with the test in progress.
ALREADY_STARTED.title: Test Already Started

INVALID_ANSWER_IDS.message: One or more of the selected answers are invalid for this question. Please select only valid answers.
INVALID_ANSWER_IDS.title: Invalid Answers

INVALID_INPUT.message: The provided input is invalid. Please check your data and try again.
INVALID_INPUT.title: Invalid Input

NOT_FOUND.message: This resource has not been found. Please try again later or check your request.
NOT_FOUND.title: Not found

NOT_STARTED.message: The test has not been started yet. You need to start the test before you can complete this action.
NOT_STARTED.title: Test Not Started

NO_QUESTIONS.message: No questions found for the selected criteria. Please try again after changing your test generation filters and options.
NO_QUESTIONS.title: No questions

QUESTION_NOT_FOUND.message: The requested question couldn't be found in this test. Please try again or contact support.
QUESTION_NOT_FOUND.title: Question Not Found

TIME_LIMIT_EXCEEDED.message: The time limit for this test has been exceeded. Your test has been automatically submitted.
TIME_LIMIT_EXCEEDED.title: Time Limit Exceeded

UNAUTHENTICATED.message: You are currently unauthenticated. You need to be signed into your account to continue.
UNAUTHENTICATED.title: Unauthenticated

UNAUTHORIZED.message: Your account is not allowed to access this resource or execute this action. Please try again later.
UNAUTHORIZED.title: Access Denied

UNKNOWN.message: An unknown error has occured. Please try again later or make sure your request is valid.
UNKNOWN.messageCode: An unknown error has occured. Please try again later or make sure your request is valid. Error code: {code}.
UNKNOWN.title: Unknown error

HomePage.about: TesteBac prepares students for the baccalaureate or university admission exam. This platform is dedicated to students who want to test their knowledge and prepare for the important exams of their lives. The platform uses a grid test system, which provides instant feedback and helps students improve their knowledge. The tests are structured by subjects and chapters, to provide the most efficient and personalized preparation. To get started, choose the subject and chapter you want and press the start button. Good luck with your studies!
HomePage.title: Welcome to
